display_name: Does the participant currently use any of the following medications?
description:
This includes any of the following;
 a. ADHD medications
 b. Psychotropic medication(antidepressants, anxiolytics, antipsychotics)
 c. Hypnotics d.Hypoglycemic agents or insulin
 e. Antihypertensives
 f. Growth Hormone
 g. Anticonvulsants
 h. Anti-coagulants
 i. Daily oral corticosteroids
 j. Daily medications for pain
